mapper.insert: insert into l_lsr_list ( leisure_num, leisure_name, leisure_age, leisure_time, leisure_price ) values(NUM_SEQ.nextval,#{leisureName},#{leisureAge},#{leisureTime},#{leisurePrice})
mapper.select: select leisure_num, leisure_name, leisure_age, leisure_time, leisure_price from l_lsr_list order by leisure_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into L_TICKET (TICKET_NUM, TOTAL_PRICE, PH_NUM, USE_DATE, RES_DATE, PAY_TYPE) values(#{ticketNum}, #{totalPrice}, #{phNum}, #{useDate}, sysdate, #{payType})
insert into L_TICKET_DETAIL(TICKET_NUM, LEISURE_NUM, TICKET_QTY) values(#{ticketNum}, #{leisureNum}, #{ticketQty})
mapper.select: select d.ticket_num as ticket_num, d.leisure_num as leisure_num, d.ticket_qty as ticket_qty, t.use_date as use_date, u.user_id as user_id from l_ticket_detail d inner join l_user u on d.ticket_num = u.ticket_num inner join l_ticket t on d.ticket_num = t.ticket_num order by d.ticket_num
